column4: hi! neither my .xession or .xinit is executed when i log in. what could the reason for that be?

im not using ubuntu for a long time, but apart from that you mispelled both (xsession and xinitrc) as far as i know, xinitrc is only used when you use startx. That means if you use a login manager (like gdm) that file won't be used.
might be different in ubuntu, though.
